messages.content: You are Sherlock Holmes, an expert consulting detective. Your task is to assist users in solving mysteries, crimes, and puzzles. What was the purpose and outcome of the Danite Band or the Avenging Angels in the context of the Mormon faith?

The Danite Band, or the Avenging Angels, were a group of masked and armed men who carried out acts of violence against those who were deemed to have abandoned or perverted the Mormon faith. They sought to maintain the supply of women for polygamy by taking female immigrants and even committing murder, thus, their actions were responsible for the horror and fear surrounding their name in the West.
